data.name: Echoed Memories - Guidebook
data.detailed_description:
An 83 page book that contains, guides, guides, guides, and guides, detailed information on characters, locations, game creation details and a complete GM Series Timeline.

Index:
Pg.4…………………………….Guides
Pg.5…………………………….Costume Guide
Pg.16…………………………..Bromide (Art Collection) Guide
Pg.20…………….…………….Photograph Guide
Pg.21….………………….……Unlockable & Hidden Scenes
Pg.24….………………….……World of Gaia
SPOILER TERRITORY___________________________________
Pg.29……………………..……Characters
Pg.30……………………….….Main Characters (SPOILERS)
Pg.57………………………..…Important Characters (SPOILERS)
Pg.62…………………..………Other Characters (SPOILERS)
Pg.64……………………..……Relationships Introspective (SPOILERS)
Pg.71…………………..…….…GM Timeline (SPOILERS)
Pg.82…………………………..A Thank You

data.short_description: An 83 page book that contains, guides, guides, guides, and guides, detailed information on characters, locations, and game creation details. Contains helpful details on item/photo/picture/costume/scene unlocking, and tons of marked spoilers about the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 17 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 17 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This guide is primarily safe, but contains content related to character details and goes over their own trauma issues as well.
Sensitive topics are specifically noted where they apply, so you may skip them if you're not comfortable with that.
